duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist an HR Specialist with the selection of 25 percent of Testing Designated Positions (TDPs) for random drug testing each year.
Assist with administering reasonable suspicion, post-accident, or unsafe practice drug tests.
Maintain a current list of employees in TDPs and volunteers for random testing.
Coordinate and schedule the drug testing dates and locations for on-site and remote locations.
Deliver test notifications to appropriate personnel and send test result notifications within established timeframes.
Assist with pre-employment drug testing and coordinating retests of specimens.
Track and test employees within the requested timeframe by Agency personnel.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma is required. Bachelor's degree may be preferred.
